column5: Hey everyone I recorded this video earlier today just to show you how to make a hatcam for some awesome hands free fishing. If you like it feel free to rate it and leave a comment on youtube.  Thanks all
i guess i need a smaller digital camera   ......   cool trick
Good idea, I think I would thread a peace of cord threw the hat and tie it around your neck. Just in case
Works...or you could just pay a camera crew...that's what I do
My wife thinks I'm enough of a techno-dork with some of the things I do. I'm going to have to pass on this one.
Hope it's a waterproof camera....and that's coming from a guy that dunked three of them in one year !

I just had a thought...  If you used a Bob Dylan-type harmonica mount for your camera, you could mount it on your chest, fish hands-free, and maybe even see the view screen as you're recording.  It shouldn't be too hard to copy that kind of frame in heavy wire (coat-hanger?) and adapt it to hold a camera.  Your next project!
lol that might be an idea
